summary: a simple music replacer for skyrim that replaces skyrim music with christmas music
descriptionHtml:
This mod is currently unfinished and i will be updating it in the coming days.

Lanterns used in the screenshots are from the mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27845]Christmas Lanterns by MannyGT[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=204447194]Skyrim christmas music replacer - Steam workshop[/url]

[u][b]FOR ALL OF YOU WHO SAY THE MUSIC IS LOO LOUD USE THE INGAME SETTINGS IN SKYRIM TO ADJUST THE MUSIC![/b][/u]

List of music currently in the mod:

===The list may change in future updates===

maintheme
Sleigh Bells Sound effect

Combat
August Burns Red - Carol of the bells
Christmas Eve Sarajevo 12 24 by the Trans-Siberian Orchestra
Killing Floor Twisted Christmas 2011 Soundtrack - Housetop Click Click Click


Dungeon
Killing Floor Christmas Music - Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairy

Exploring

Day
Henry Mancini - Frosty the Snowman
I Wish It Could Be Christmas Everyday - Wizzard
Merry Christmas Everyone - Shakin Stevens
Night
Silent Night
Sleigh Bells Sound effect(Sounds like santa is here)

[img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/3037/umc5.png[/img]
Brenda Lee - Rockin around the christmas tree
Jingle Bell Rock
Killing Floor Christmas Music - Jingle Bells
Mariah Carey - All I Want For Christmas Is You

Town
Brenda Lee - Rockin around the christmas tree
It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Christmas - Johnny Mathis
It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year
Johnny Mathis - Silver Bells
Killing Floor Christmas Music - Jingle Bells
Let It Snow - Harry Connick Jr.
Paul McCartney - Simply Having A Wonderful Christmas Time
Sleigh Ride - Jack Jones
Suite From The Polar Express - Alan Silvestri - The Polar Express
Winter Wonderland - Tony Bennett
author: visedgrunt
